entity.name: SimpleDomain
entity.documentation: A simple domain with one (generated) id field, fields of different types, and two sample queries.

field.name: theDate1
field.documentation: An important date for this domain

field.name: theLong1
field.documentation: A relevant number for this domain

query.name: SelectAllSimpleDomainsByType
query.documentation: Retrieves domains of a given type

criterion.name: type
criterion.documentation: The class of domains to retrieve

query.statement: from SimpleDomainBO as domain where domain.type = :type

query.name: SelectAllSimpleDomainsByName
query.documentation: Retrieves SimpleDomain objects with the given name

criterion.name: name
criterion.documentation: The desired name of the SimpleDomain objects to retrieve

query.statement: from SimpleDomainBO as domain where domain.name = :name
